TopicTitle: [Music] - A Wild Ride into the Unknown - Music and Images

Articles.Content:
Funny what runs through your head when you are docking your spacestation

I posted this on reddit, but wanted to get this back on the regular channels. I thought of this one when lifting off and attempting to dock with my spacestation. Docking is always a stressful few moments for me and I felt it deserving of a great intense track.

Not exceedingly fitting in the game but it just feels right LOL

Without further ado...

https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2/a-wild-ride-into-the-unknown

also, some pics
